ygData.subject: RE: Plane of losses
ygData.msgSnippet: No matter what they say I still find it hilarious that people consider it a problem that they are afraid to go to the Plane of Fear.  I feel for those who were
ygData.messageBody:
No matter what they say I still find it hilarious that people consider it a
problem that they are afraid to go to the Plane of Fear. I feel for those
who were slaughtered, but I think we should all be afraid to go there. It
shouldn't be hopeless, but it should be feared, not merely viewed as a new
place to get xp and cool items.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Bard [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 4:24 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of losses


From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

A "gm exursion", eh? Maybe they are looking into why no one goes there
anymore?
:::crosses fingers:::

-=B=-
